author: ccustine
msg: DIRSERVER-921 - This commit makes the scripts work with JRE 1.6.  This isn't really necessary with the new daemon, but you will still be able to use Procrun and Jsvc so I am getting this fix in just in case someone still wants to use them.

author: jonesde
msg: Implemented feature to lookup city or county or other tax jurisdiction by postal code; includes some demo/test data for it that will work with DemoCustomer; there are some new patterns established like a convention for postal code ID within a country

author: ate
msg: - updated requirements: minimum servlet container now 2.4 which thus also excludes tomcat 5.0 and Websphere 5.1 (AFAIK)
(note: these changes are *not* part of the 2.1.2 release source, but the the new full distribution contains the generated website and that one is up to date)

author: ate
msg: - added andromda example links to site
